mapper.insert: insert into alg_star (star_sn, mod_sn, usr_sn, creat_time) values (#{starSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select star_sn, mod_sn, usr_sn, creat_time from alg_star

select algModule.mod_name,algArticleList.papertext,algProgramLang.lan_name, date_format(algModuleVersion.create_date,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s')create_time from alg_star algStar left join alg_module algModule on algStar.mod_sn=algModule.mod_sn left join alg_article_list algArticleList on algModule.atl_sn = algArticleList.id left join alg_program_lang algProgramLang on algModule.lan_sn=algProgramLang.lan_sn left join alg_module_version algModuleVersion on algModule.mod_sn=algModuleVersion.mod_sn where algStar.usr_sn= #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
